description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Follow the adventures of the young ninja girl, Jade Konoichi, as she races through the forest to save the butterflies from the evil wasp king.  Dash through four colorful seasons!  Avoid angry wasps and ants as you leap over pits in a quest for a high score!  Use your collected butterflies to buy power-ups, like Speed Boost, Monarch Song, and even a feisty Sidekick.
